message: I have a PHP script that execute a command "Java -jar ....." It works on my Linux OS I tried to run it on "hostinger" -a free hosting site- but it didn't work what should I do, I this a free hosting sites that supports Java and .jar files, I googled but didn't reach any useful ideas.

data.message: Maybe you are not allowed to run this command. Have you tried to contact hostinger support ? Or try to return the response while executing the command
system() exec() passthru() shell_exec() are always disabled on all shared hosting.. I'm pretty sure this is your problem... to make sure try to print the disabled functions, or ask the support..

Shared hosting doesn't allow shell scripts... 
U need to talk to ur hosting service provider...

this might not be very relevant, but I once succeeded it running making an ASP.NET application run a java program on GoDaddy's shared hosting, I put a portable version of JRE over there and executed it and it worked!
... kind of, the JAR file was a Minecraft Server, it ran and I saw the console output (I redirected it), but their firewall prevented me from connecting to that server :D
